summary: This mod differentiates roads from snowy roads
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
This mod is mainly aimed at  [b]parallax map users[/b] who have mismatching textures for snowy and regular roads.

[heading]FAQ[/heading]
[list]
[*]How does it work?
[*]It adds vanilla meshes for snowy roads.

[*]Why would I need that?
[*]In case you are using parallax mapping that makes your roads look awesome but have mismatching snowy road textures your snowy roads may look bad.

[*]Explain that again!
[*]Skyrim utilizes the same road meshes for everything, no matter the texture. If you like textures from texture pack #A but you prefer the snow from texture pack #B and your parallax maps won\'t work properly on both then this is for you!

[*]You said it uses vanilla meshes for snowy roads, but what if I have compatible meshes for my snowy roads as well?! Can I use both?
[*]Sure!

[*]How do I do that?
[*]Simply take the meshes that are compatible with your snowy roads and rename them; add \"[i]snow[/i]\" in front of each of the files. For example [i]roadscurver01.nif[/i] will become [i]snowroadscurver01.nif[/i]. Now overwrite my files with your newly renamed files.

[*]Can I use the Nexus Mod Manager to install this?
[*]Not at the moment.

[*]And in the near future?
[*]I\'ve never tried before, but if I figure it out or get some help I could make a NMM compatible version.
[/list]

[heading]Compatiblity[/heading]
As far as I know it should be compatible with pretty much everything.

[heading]Manual installation[/heading]
Simply extract everything into your Skyrim\\Data folder

[heading]Manual removal[/heading]
Delete Different needs for different roads.esp
Delete every .nif file starting with \"snow\" in your Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Landscape\\Roads folder
author: dukefx
